H0.text: The Treaty of Kiel, between the UK, Sweden and Denmark-Norway was intended to ease hostilities relating to which war. French Revolutionary War

H1.text: The Treaty of Kiel, between the UK, Sweden and Denmark-Norway was intended to ease hostilities relating to which war. War of the Austrian Succession

H2.text: The Treaty of Kiel, between the UK, Sweden and Denmark-Norway was intended to ease hostilities relating to which war. Russo-Swedish War

H3.text: The Treaty of Kiel, between the UK, Sweden and Denmark-Norway was intended to ease hostilities relating to which war. Napole√≥n

A4.text: Napoleon decisively beat the Russian army at Friedland (14 June 1807), following which Alexander had to make peace with Napoleon at Tilsit (7 July 1807).

A5.text: Denmark was forced to cede Norway to Sweden mainly as a compensation for the loss of Finland which the other coalition members agreed to.
